attributes.action: Accept the resignations of the RBS directors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As taxpayers who own over seventy percent of the Royal Bank of Scotland we demand the Prime minister accepts the resignation of the board of directors of RBS who are unable to control their greed.
As majority owners of RBS we refuse to let the Directors waste our money paying bonuses.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
